message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics techniques for synthesizing free-viewpoint videos of sports scenes. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves 3D modeling and rendering, which falls under cs.GR (Computer Graphics). The use of space carving and back-projection techniques suggests that the paper may also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper deals with object segmentation and occlusion detection, which are relevant to robotics and autonomous systems, indicating that it may also belong to cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper proposes a novel algorithm that utilizes a raw 3D model and renders billboard models, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, suggesting that it may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
